name: Clock Ticker - Incremental Game
description:
A short "clicker/idle/Incremental" game.  No saving or offline functionalities.

Usually, these types of games start with fast progress that slows down gradually. This one does the opposite.

Length: Can be finished in 40 minutes, but will more likely take an hour or two.

Made for 2 game jams: Clicker Jam Spring 2022, where the goal was to make an Incremental game in a single week; and Black and White Jam #8, with the restriction of 2 colors and the theme "loop".

Had to skip the latter jam in the end because the rules didn't allow for non-copyrighted stuff (I used public domain sounds).

Tools used: Construct 3 (game engine and graphics), Reaper (sound editing).

Sounds used:

- Second Tick

- Minute tock

- Hour tick

- Upgrade tock

- Heartbeat
